name: mykhsu-site
description: Мой ИТИ ХГУ - Официальное мобильное приложение

scripts.build: npx react-scripts build && npm run sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org sculk --project mykhsu-site ./build && sentry-cli --url https://sentry.sculkmetrics.com/ sourcemaps upload --org sculk --project mykhsu-site ./build
